channel.title: How to make dragon claws gfx's like cerda owns with teh claws?!? will rep++!
channel.description:
Hi, Does anyone know how you can stand STILL and do the Dragon Claws Special Attack?
The one like "Cerda owns with teh Claws!"
Will rep++

The one like “Cerda owns with teh Claws!”

Will rep++[/quote]
